page.title: 02PEOPLE OF FLODIGARRY
page.content:
There are 56 people living in the area. AGE RANGE ----------------------------------- 0-12 13-16 17-40 41-60 OVER 60 ----------------------------------- 5 7 20 11 13
Of the 14 houses in the area 12 are crofts, which are worked on a part-time basis.Most men are in employment or retired.3 work on North Sea oil-rigs and there are joiners, telephone engineers, drivers.Most women work in the tourist season.Some work all year round in offices either in Staffin 5 miles or Portree 20 miles away,teaching or the home help service.
